snippet.title: Armchair Quarterback gameplay (PC Game, 1985)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Armchair Quarterback, Dos PC game produced by Pseudonym Software in 1985 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/armchair-quarterback/3848/
Armchair Quarterback is a very nice game based on text. This game is about American football, besides the management team must take care of the money.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
NFL Challenge - https://youtu.be/bn0xtlyRygA
John Madden Football - https://youtu.be/rCa1yEA0EMU
